entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
